{{short description|2022 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 52|location=Albuquerque, New Mexico|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=29 July - 1 August [[2022]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 51]]|next=[[Mythcon 53]]}}'''Mythcon 52''' was the fifty-second annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

* '''Theme:''' "The Mythic, The Fantastic, and the Alien"
* '''Guests of Honor:''' Rivera Sun (fantasy author), and [[David Bratman]] ([[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar)
